data.text: @ChrisCoons Democrat policies keep him free to rape ...https://t.co/Jsvxw7daPE

@ChrisCoons Iran’s rulers show no mercy at home & threaten the world. Any negotiation now undermines the Iranian people’s fight for rights & emboldens terror.
US must reject deals, prioritize accountability & the democratic will of Iranians over short-term diplomacy.#MilitarySupportForIran

@ChrisCoons You should read the replies to your tweets. Then maybe you'll stop and leave DC in shame. Americans don't like you and wish you and your trans everything, open border, crime, inflation, tax&spend, Godless party would go away forever because one day your party will destroy America

@ChrisCoons Senator, history is watching. Silence in the face of #IranMassacare speaks volumes. Iranians are demanding freedom and accountability:
The Iranian people NEED strong, targeted military support. Over 43,000 lives lost in just 48 hours, with thousands more facing execution.
@ChrisCoons Everything opposite Trump. Unfortunately democrats have much more significant problems. https://t.co/shaGTyB7fk
@ChrisCoons Yep!!  Rinse & repeat was all it was with a few "hells" thrown in for good measure.😵‍💫
@ChrisCoons Please continue to speak for Iran’s political prisoners and unarmed protesters. Your voice matters.

@ChrisCoons Mercy on the children of US citizens,who are born abroad & amend section 301g of Immigration and Nationality Act by removing or reducing  physical presence of 5years in US  for parent. This may include in pending Immigration Reform Bill in Congress of American Families United Act
